description: This Java source file defines various Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes related to authentication, including registration, login, and authentication response structures.

classes.name: AuthDtos
classes.description: A container class for authentication-related DTOs.

inner_classes.name: RegisterRequest
inner_classes.description: DTO for registration requests, containing username and password fields.

inner_classes.name: LoginRequest
inner_classes.description: DTO for login requests, containing username and password fields.

inner_classes.name: AuthResponse
inner_classes.description: DTO representing the authentication response containing a JWT token.
